Oroworukwo bụ otu n'ime ime obodo ndị dị na Port Harcourt Local Government Area, Rivers State, Nigeria.
Oroworukwo bụ ngalaba dị na Port Harcourt Local Government Area nke Rivers State, Nigeria. Ngalaba ntuli aka dị na Oroworukwo, Port Harcourt gụnyere; St
Paul's School I, St St' Paul II, Ogbonda Mati Hall Iv, Ogoloma Hall wdg.
Ọ bụ na Nkpolu-Oroworukwo obere obodo dị na Orowurukyo ka ehibere Rivers State University of Science and Technology.
